description.body:
This mural is dedicated to League players—the most creative and passionate community in the world. 

Kim Jung Gi is a renowned graphic artist from South Korea known for his vivid comic style and richly-detailed renderings from memory. This is Kim Jung Gi’s third collaboration with Riot Games.
